segments.text: How many credits are you taking this semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to have at least eighteen to keep my scholarships and grant . But so far , I only have fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the matter , are the classes you want full ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And now I'm down to either taking a class I'm not going to need or considering a double major .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you were to take on a double major , what would be your first choice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think with International Business a language would be appropriate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you even thought that far ahead ? I mean what country would you like to do business with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a matter of fact , I would like to work in South America . So some Latin language like Spanish or Portuguese would work .
segments.speaker: S2
